type: Tutorial Step - Find the Node Challenge

definition.text: The Trading Engine administers the complexity entailed in automated trading by making information accessible to users and trading systems.

paragraphs.text: Rember my comments about granularity? Remember how the formula on the trading system fetched the value of the exit target rate? Here's a quick reminder:

What if I told you that this string holds the path to that piece of information in the data structure of the Trading Engine hierarchy? Can you find the Exit Target Rate node? Expand the node and follow the breadcrumb trail!
